metadata.title: USN-3704-1 -- devscripts vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that devscripts incorrectly handled certain YAML files. An attacker could possibly use this to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3704-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  devscripts - 2.17.12ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
